title: (x) Bah Humbug - hand drawn {Patricia}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826233026im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/43063.jpg)   
   
This reminded me of Bickham script but that's not it. Any ideas?   
   
Thanx!
author: aardvrk

comments.content: This looks like a hand drawn logo to me. I doubt there's a font with such creative swashes.

Indeed. It looks like the sort of calligraphic display that some artists use to demonstrate their skills -- men like Hermann Zapf, Arthur Baker, Philip Bouwsma, and many others, do this sort of thing to show the rest of us that fonts don't do everything.

Thanks to both of you for checking... I was hoping this would be something that I could buy. It's so pretty! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826233026im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)

[Here](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826233026/http:/www.alphabytes.com/pages/design_14.html) is where the sample is shown on Rob Leuscke's site. However, it is not a font. It is his calligraphic lettering ï¿½ more or less what I described in my earlier post in this thread.
Thanks for all the great detective work. I love this place! ![:-)](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826233026im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/clipart/happy.gif)
